argument.description: The string to test for a null value.
The value returned if string1 is not null.
The value returned if string1 is null.

returnType: The NVL2 function returns a substitute value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL NVL2 function extends the functionality found in the NVL function. It lets you substitutes a value when a null value is encountered as well as when a non-null value is encountered.
